page.title: 01OXHILL-WHATCOTE-IDLICOTE
page.content:
Oxhill,Whatcote,and Idlicote are predominantly agricultural villages situated in the rural area of South Warwickshire.
The information detailed has been chosen to give an informative and revealing picture of these villages in 1985 by recording topics such as; {farming,landscape,ecology and climate, which seem particularly relevant to this area;{population, housing,trade {and education,}which provides details of residents,where they live, commercial enterprise,and their children's educational prospects;{home {life,arts and crafts, clubs and {village events,}which highlight family and domestic life; religion, which highlights general beliefs and,finally,{local history of the {villages.}
